org.csstudio.platform.security
Class Right

java.lang.Object
  org.csstudio.platform.security.Right

public class Right
extends java.lang.Object

Defines a right for the CSS core security system.
A CSS right consists of:

  • A site specific role ("MANAGER", for example).
  • A site specific group ("CRYO", for example).

Author:
Kai Meyer & Torsten Witte & Alexander Will & Sven Wende
